definition: of or relating to or involved the practice of aiding the memory, a device (such as a rhyme or acronym) used to aid recall
details:
adjective
- of or relating to or involved the practice of aiding the memory
= example: of or relating to or involved the practice of aiding the memory
= synonyms: mnemotechnic, mnemotechnical
noun
- a device (such as a rhyme or acronym) used to aid recall
